item.title: Need help ho to add commands
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

~~ normal command ~~
A command that gives you items…

if (command.startsWith("commandhere")) { addItem(itemID, amount) }

Or a command that teleports…

if (command.startsWith("commandhere")) { teleportToX = XCoords teleportToY = YCoords sendMessage("you teleport away") }

(the sendMessage sends the character a message)

How to make the command work for owners and admins only

if (command.startsWith("commandname") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(itemID, amount) sendMessage("your message here") }

or make it only work for you…

if (command.startsWith("commandhere") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname"))[code] } addItem(itemID, amount) {[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help ho to add commands
